AND Avg(( review_price_rate + review_service_rate + review_food_rate + review_clean_rate + review_location_rate ) / 5) > #{hotelRate})
AND Avg(review_price_rate) > #{hotelRate})
AND Avg(review_clean_rate) > #{hotelRate})
AND Avg(review_service_rate) > #{hotelRate})
AND Avg(review_food_rate) > #{hotelRate})
AND Avg(review_location_rate) > #{hotelRate})
)
AND r.room_price*(1 + pp.price_peak_season + pp.price_weekday + pp.price_breakfast) > #{minMoney}
AND r.room_price*(1 + pp.price_peak_season + pp.price_weekday + pp.price_breakfast) < #{maxMoney}
AND room_standard_person_number >= #{adultNumber} AND room_child_max_number >= #{childNumber}) join (select hotel_id, avg(review_service_rate) "avg_rate" from reviews group by hotel_id) "rate" using(hotel_id) WHERE room_id NOT IN(SELECT room_id FROM reservations WHERE room_id in(select room_id from rooms where hotel_id in(SELECT hotel_id FROM hotels join locations using(location_id) WHERE location_name = #{location}) AND room_standard_person_number >= #{adultNumber} AND room_child_max_number >= #{childNumber}) AND ( ( To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > #{startDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{startDay} ) OR ( To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{endDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < #{endDay} ) OR ( To_char(reservation_end_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{endDay} AND To_char(reservation_start_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{startDay} ) )) GROUP BY hotel_id, "avg_rate", room_name
